title: AI-Powered Task Prioritization
description: Develop an intelligent system that automatically prioritizes user tasks based on deadlines, importance, and user habits to maximize productivity and reduce stress.
business_value: Increase user productivity and satisfaction by ensuring users focus on the most important tasks first.

title: Smart Scheduling & Personalization
description: Implement a smart scheduling engine that suggests optimal working times and adapts to user routines, enabling personalized time management for work and study.
business_value: Empower users to optimize their schedules and achieve personal goals efficiently.

title: Task Breakdown & Timeline Visualization
description: Enable users to break down large tasks into manageable subtasks with clear timelines, improving organization and reducing overwhelm.
business_value: Help users manage complex tasks more effectively and reduce stress through better planning.

title: Focus Mode & Productivity Tracking
description: Provide a distraction-free focus mode with Pomodoro timer and productivity analytics to help users maintain concentration and track their progress.
business_value: Support users in achieving deep work and monitoring their productivity improvements.

title: Secure Authentication & User Data Protection
description: Build a secure authentication system with two-factor authentication and robust data encryption to protect user information and ensure privacy.
business_value: Ensure user trust and compliance by safeguarding sensitive data and access.

title: As a user, I want the system to prioritize my tasks automatically so that I can focus on the most important ones first
description: Enable automatic task prioritization based on deadlines, importance, and user habits.
acceptance_criteria: Given user has multiple tasks, When system analyzes deadlines and importance, Then tasks are sorted by priority
Given user updates a task, When task details change, Then priority list is updated in real-time
Given user views task list, When priority is set, Then highest priority tasks appear at the top
business_value: Reduce user stress and improve productivity by focusing attention on critical tasks.

title: As a user, I want the system to suggest optimal working times so that I can maximize my productivity
description: Provide personalized time suggestions based on user schedule and habits.
acceptance_criteria: Given user has a set schedule, When system analyzes habits, Then optimal time slots are suggested
Given user receives a suggestion, When user accepts or modifies it, Then schedule is updated accordingly
Given user changes routine, When habits are updated, Then new suggestions are generated
business_value: Help users optimize their work/study hours for better results and satisfaction.

title: As a user, I want the system to break down large tasks into subtasks so that I can manage them more effectively
description: Allow users to split complex tasks into smaller, actionable items with clear timelines.
acceptance_criteria: Given user creates a large task, When system analyzes the task, Then subtasks are generated automatically
Given user views a task, When subtasks exist, Then timeline for each subtask is displayed
Given user edits subtasks, When changes are made, Then updates are reflected in the timeline
business_value: Enable users to organize and complete complex tasks with less stress.

title: As a user, I want a focus mode with a Pomodoro timer so that I can work without distractions
description: Provide a dedicated focus mode with Pomodoro timer and notification blocking.
acceptance_criteria: Given user activates focus mode, When timer starts, Then notifications are blocked
Given user completes a Pomodoro session, When timer ends, Then productivity stats are updated
Given user exits focus mode, When session ends, Then notifications are restored
business_value: Help users maintain concentration and track productivity improvements.

title: As a user, I want to login securely with two-factor authentication so that my account and data are protected
description: Implement secure login with password and two-factor authentication for user safety.
acceptance_criteria: Given user enters valid credentials, When two-factor code is provided, Then user is logged in
Given user enters invalid credentials or code, When login is attempted, Then error message is displayed
Given user is logged in, When session expires, Then user is prompted to re-authenticate
business_value: Protect user accounts and sensitive data from unauthorized access.

title: Integrate with Google Calendar and Outlook
description: Develop integration layer to sync user schedules with Google Calendar and Outlook APIs.
acceptance_criteria: Given user connects calendar, When integration is successful, Then events are synced
Given user updates schedule, When changes are made, Then external calendars are updated

title: Implement user data encryption
description: Set up encryption for user data at rest and in transit using industry standards.
acceptance_criteria: Given user data is stored, When encryption is applied, Then data is unreadable without keys
Given data is transmitted, When encryption is active, Then data is secure during transfer

title: Develop AI prioritization algorithm
description: Implement logic to analyze tasks and assign priority scores based on rules.
acceptance_criteria: Algorithm calculates priority based on deadline and importance
Priority scores are updated when task data changes
Unit tests cover all priority scenarios

title: Create prioritized task list UI
description: Design and implement UI to display tasks sorted by priority.
acceptance_criteria: UI shows tasks sorted by priority
Priority changes reflected instantly
Accessibility standards are met

title: Write unit tests for prioritization logic
description: Create unit tests to validate AI prioritization algorithm.
acceptance_criteria: Test priority calculation for various task inputs
Test updates when task data changes
Test edge cases for deadlines and importance

title: Write integration tests for prioritized task list
description: Create end-to-end tests for task list UI and backend integration.
acceptance_criteria: Test UI displays correct priority order
Test real-time updates on UI when priorities change
Test accessibility features

title: Implement smart scheduling engine
description: Develop backend logic to suggest optimal working times based on user habits.
acceptance_criteria: Engine analyzes user schedule and habits
Suggestions are generated and updated dynamically
Unit tests validate suggestion accuracy

title: Design schedule suggestion UI
description: Create UI for displaying and editing suggested working times.
acceptance_criteria: UI shows suggested time slots
User can accept or modify suggestions
Changes are reflected in backend

title: Write unit tests for scheduling engine
description: Create tests to validate smart scheduling logic.
acceptance_criteria: Test suggestion accuracy for various user habits
Test updates when habits change
Test edge cases for conflicting schedules

title: Write integration tests for schedule suggestion UI
description: Create end-to-end tests for UI and backend schedule suggestions.
acceptance_criteria: Test UI displays correct suggestions
Test user modifications update backend
Test accessibility compliance

title: Develop calendar integration module
description: Implement API integration for Google Calendar and Outlook.
acceptance_criteria: API connects to Google Calendar and Outlook
Events are synced bi-directionally
Error handling for failed sync

title: Write integration tests for calendar sync
description: Create tests for calendar sync functionality.
acceptance_criteria: Test successful sync with Google Calendar
Test successful sync with Outlook
Test error handling for failed sync

title: Implement task breakdown logic
description: Develop backend logic to split large tasks into subtasks with timelines.
acceptance_criteria: Large tasks are split into subtasks automatically
Timeline for each subtask is generated
Unit tests cover breakdown scenarios

title: Design subtask timeline UI
description: Create UI to visualize subtasks and their timelines.
acceptance_criteria: UI displays subtasks with timelines
User can edit subtasks and timelines
Accessibility standards are met

title: Write unit tests for task breakdown
description: Create tests for backend task breakdown logic.
acceptance_criteria: Test breakdown for various task sizes
Test timeline generation accuracy
Test editing of subtasks

title: Write integration tests for subtask timeline UI
description: Create end-to-end tests for subtask timeline UI and backend.
acceptance_criteria: Test UI displays correct timelines
Test editing updates backend
Test accessibility compliance

title: Develop Pomodoro timer logic
description: Implement backend and frontend logic for Pomodoro timer.
acceptance_criteria: Timer starts and stops correctly
Session data is tracked
Unit tests validate timer logic

title: Implement notification blocking in focus mode
description: Develop logic to block notifications during focus mode.
acceptance_criteria: Notifications are blocked during focus mode
Notifications are restored after session
Unit tests cover notification logic

title: Write unit tests for Pomodoro timer and focus mode
description: Create tests for timer and notification blocking features.
acceptance_criteria: Test timer start/stop functionality
Test notification blocking and restoration
Test productivity stats update

title: Develop secure login API with 2FA
description: Implement backend login API with password and two-factor authentication.
acceptance_criteria: API validates password and 2FA code
Session is created on successful login
Unit tests cover authentication scenarios

title: Create login UI with 2FA input
description: Design and implement login form with two-factor authentication input.
acceptance_criteria: UI includes password and 2FA code fields
Error messages for invalid input
Accessibility standards are met

title: Write unit tests for secure login API
description: Create tests for backend login and 2FA logic.
acceptance_criteria: Test valid and invalid login scenarios
Test 2FA code validation
Test session expiry

title: Write integration tests for login UI and API
description: Create end-to-end tests for login flow with 2FA.
acceptance_criteria: Test successful login with 2FA
Test error messages for invalid credentials
Test session expiry and re-authentication

title: Implement data encryption at rest
description: Set up encryption for stored user data using AES-256.
acceptance_criteria: User data is encrypted before storage
Decryption works for authorized access
Unit tests validate encryption/decryption

title: Implement data encryption in transit
description: Configure TLS for secure data transmission.
acceptance_criteria: TLS is enabled for all API endpoints
Data is encrypted during transfer
Unit tests verify secure transmission

title: Write tests for data encryption
description: Create tests for encryption at rest and in transit.
acceptance_criteria: Test data is unreadable without keys
Test secure transmission with TLS
Test unauthorized access is blocked
